about_the_game:
Dive into the untamed wilderness and put your survival skills to the test in the Bushcraft Simulator. This immersive open-world adventure challenges you to live off the land, honing essential bushcraft skills like resource gathering, tool crafting, shelter building, and hunting for food. Every decision you make shapes your survival journey.

Traverse lush forests, rugged mountains, and hidden lakes as you build your self-reliance. Craft advanced gear from raw materials, engineer solutions to tame the elements, and master the delicate balance between humanity and nature.

Key Features:

  • Immersive Wilderness: Experience dynamic weather, day-night cycles, and diverse wildlife in a richly detailed natural environment.

  • Authentic Crafting System: Use gathered resources to create tools, clothing, and shelters that reflect real-world bushcraft techniques.

  • Survival Mechanics: Manage hunger, thirst, energy, and temperature while facing harsh conditions and unpredictable hazards.

  • Adaptive Skill Progression: Level up your bushcraft expertise by completing tasks, discovering new methods, and upgrading your gear.

  • Sandbox and Challenge Modes: Choose between open-ended exploration or specific survival scenarios that test your wits.

Forge your path through nature, unleash your creativity, and prove you have the resourcefulness to thrive in the wild.

short_description: Stranded in the wild with only your skills and wits, gather resources, craft tools, and build shelters to endure a hostile environment. Alone or with friends, battle the elements, hunt for survival, and push your bushcraft prowess to its limits.
